text: Yuvarlakia Yuvarlakia, giouvarlakia (Greek γιουβαρλάκια, from Turkish yuvarlak 'round'Λεξικό της κοινής Νεοελληνικής (Dictionary of Common Modern Greek), Ινστιτούτο Νεοελληνικών Σπουδών, Θεσσαλονίκη, 1998. , s.v.) is the Greek term for the rice and ground meat filling of sarma, prepared as a meatball. They may be served in tomato or avgolemono sauce. ==See also== * List of meatball dishes == References == ==External links== * Recipe Category:Greek soups
title: Yuvarlakia
